<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Bulk update ticket custom fields"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/set-info"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates custom field values across multiple tickets in a single operation.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TicketIds** – Use [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to build the target list and extract `Items[].TicketId`.
2. **Custom field metadata** – Retrieve field identifiers from [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) response (`Item.CustomFieldValues[].CustomFieldId`) or the custom field catalog.

**Workflow Example**
1. Identify tickets: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) with filters (status, site, product) → collect `Items[].TicketId`.
2. Inspect an example ticket: [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) to confirm `CustomFieldValues[].CustomFieldId` keys.
3. Submit bulk update: [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/bulk/set-info](/docs/api/tickets/bulk-update-ticket-info) with `TicketIds` and `Request.Values` describing the new custom field values.

**Minimal Required Fields**: TicketIds[], Request.Values[]

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"TicketIds":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchTickets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/tickets","responseField":"Items[].TicketId"}},"description":"Array of ticket UUIDs that should receive the updates. Obtain via POST /api/v1.0/tickets and extract `Items[].TicketId`."},"Request":{"type":"object","properties":{"Values":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"Key":{"type":"string","description":"Custom field identifier (e.g., custom-field:{id}). Obtain allowed identifiers from [GET /api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}](/docs/api/tickets/get-ticket) `Item.CustomFieldValues[].CustomFieldId` or [GET /api/v1.0/custom-fields](/docs/api/custom-fields/search-custom-fields).","example":"custom-field:9f0c8306-4f2b-4af8-8f87-0e3918e0d3ab"},"Value":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Value to assign to the custom field"}},"required":["Key"],"title":"TicketBulkSetInfoValue"},"minItems":1,"description":"Collection of custom field updates to apply to each ticket."}},"required":["Values"]}},"required":["TicketIds","Request"],"title":"TicketBulkSetInfoRequest"}}},"description":"Bulk custom field update payload including target tickets and new values."}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Ticket custom fields updated"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
